item.title: umi-ui bug using react-document-title
item.description: 背景 React 项目使用umi时发报： Uncaught Invariant Violation: React.Children.only expected to receive a single React element child. The above error occurred in the component ui socket init CloseEvent {type: “close”, bubbles: false, cancelable: false, timeStamp: 1571127775342, wasClean: false, …} 异常代码 1 2 3 4 5 <DocumentTitle title={this.renderPageTitle()}> <ContainerQuery query={query}> {(params: any) => <div className={classNames(params)}>{layout}</div>} </ContainerQuery> </DocumentTitle> DocumentTitle组件内部最外层只能接受一个元素，而代码中有多个元素，所以报错。 解决方案 用<div></div>或者<></>在外部包裹后就OK，不再报错，页面可正常显示。
